naslov: PRODAJA - VILA 400m2 s bazenom i konobom - ZEMUNIK DONJI (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: PRDAJA - VILA 400m2 sa bazenom i konobom - ZEMUNIK DONJI Prodajemo Vilu u Zemuniku Donjem, u mirnom dijelu na kraju slijepe ulice. Nalazi se 10km od Zadra, 8km od Sukošana i 3km od autoceste. U blizini centra, trgovina, kafića i ostalih bitnih sadržaja. Vila ukupne površine 400m2, izgrađena je 2007.g na parceli površine 830m2. U potpunosti renovirana 2022.g. U gradnji vile korišteni su materijali prve klase i opremljena je vrhunskom opremom. Sastoji se od podruma, prizemlja i prvoga kata. U podrumu se nalazi konoba sa šankom (kapacitet 30 osoba) i toaletom, skladište, tehnička soba sa 'Air Condition' stanicom te vinska konoba. U podrumu je zid sa svim izolacijama debljine 1m što i tijekom ljetnog perioda omogućava temperaturu do max 20°C. Prizemlje i prvi kat povezani su unutarnjim stepeništem. Prizemlje se sastoji od dnevnog boravka, kuhinje i blagovaonice, 2 spavaće soba, kupaonice i 2 balkona. U prizemlju se također nalazi garaža sa 2 parkirna mjesta. Na prvom katu nalaze se 4 studio apartmana (sobe), svaki sa vlastitom kupaonicom i kuhinjom. Svakom studio apartmanu pripada i balkon. U dvorištu vile nalazi se natkriveni vanjski parking sa 4 parkirna mjesta, grijani bazen (automatska analiza i doziranje vode te robot za čišćenje bazena) sa sunčalištem, igralište i kamin. Električna vrata za garažu i ulaz u dvorište sa portafonom. Krovni prozori velux na struju. Vila je opremljena video nadzorom i alarmom i postavljen je centralni usisavač prašine sa izvodima u svim prostorijama. Solarno zagrijavanje vode, preko dizalice topline, na plinski bojler i električni bojler. U dvorištu je i gusterna za pričuvnu vodu a vila je spojena i na gradski vodovod. Također, vila ima agregat za struju koji se spaja na glavnu razvodnu ploču. Daikin klime su postavljene u svim prostorijama i jedna vanjska dizalica topline na plin. Dodatno je postavljeno i centralno grijanje na plin. Vlasništvo 1/1! Moguća je zamjena za drugu nekretninu, automobil, brod.. Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar SALE - VILLA 400m2 with pool - ZEMUNIK DONJI We are selling a villa in Zemunik Donji, in a quiet area. It is located 10km from Zadar, 8km from Sukošan and 3km from the highway. Stores, bars and the center of the place is near by. The villa with a total area of ​​400m2 was built in 2007 on a plot of 830m2. Completely renovated in 2022. First-class materials were used in the construction of the villa and it is equipped with top-quality equipment. It consists of the basement, ground floor and the first floor. In the basement there is a tavern with a bar (capacity 30 people) and a toilet, a storage room, a technical room with an 'Air Condition' station and a wine tavern. A wall in the basement is isolated and 1m thick, which allows for a temperature of up to max 20°C even during the summer period. The ground floor and the first floor are connected by an internal staircase. The ground floor consists of a living room, kitchen and dining room, 2 bedrooms, bathroom and 2 balconies. There is also garage with 2 parking spaces. On the first floor there are 4 studio apartments (rooms), each with its own bathroom and kitchen. Each studio apartment also has a balcony. In the yard of the villa there is a covered outdoor parking lot with 4 parking spaces, a heated swimming pool (automatic analysis and dosing of water and a robot for cleaning the pool) with a sunbathing area, playground and fireplace. Electric garage door and entrance to the yard with intercom. Electric velux skylights. The villa is also equipped with video surveillance and an alarm, and a central vacuum cleaner. Solar water heating, via heat pump, on a gas boiler or electric boiler. The villa is connected to the city's water supply system, but there is also a water tank in the yard for reserve water. Also, the villa has an electricity generator that connects to the main switchboard. Daikin air conditioners are installed in all rooms and one external gas heat pump. Gas central heating was additionally installed. Ownership 1/1 ! Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar
